__e: The police who had been hired to protect him, assassinated him.
He shot, he missed, he beat him to the ground, and he executed him.
A man will be executed tonight.
They will die before a firing squad in the morning.
It was a choice, and he should have been executed for it.
You do understand... he might have me killed for this?
Apparently, I can get the chair for this. So let's keep it between us, okay?
He was executed on your orders.
I could have you executed on the spot.
I would not have given you the honour of being executed by a firing squad.
Now, I were also thinking... that when Jesus was being executed by the police, he never did give up.
But you're to be executed by one of your own men- the one who identified you.
